panels.description: Ascent / Descent Rate; Calculated and Reported (if available)
panels.title: Ascent / Descent Rate

panels.description: Data from payload environmental sensors (temperature, pressure, humidity), if available. Sensors with no data may report as zero.
panels.title: Payload Environmental Sensor Data

panels.description: The number of Global Navigation System (GPS, Glonass, Beidou, Galileo) satellites in use by the payload. Note that some HorusBinary payloads report the number of satellites + 100 or 200, depending on the power-save mode they are in.
panels.title: GNSS Satellites in Use

targets.query: payload_callsign.keyword : "$Payload" AND NOT sats:0 AND NOT lat:0
payload_callsign.keyword == "$Payload" AND NOT sats:0 AND NOT lat:0

panels.description: Receiver-Reported Signal-to-Noise, for receiving software and modulations that support this (e.g. Horus-GUI, HorusDemodLib)
panels.title: Signal-to-Noise Ratio

panels.description: How many packets each receiver has uploaded over the currently selected time range.
panels.title: Per-Receiver Packet Count

panels.description: The payload transmit frequency, as reported by receiver stations. Note that not all software supports reporting this, and that the reported frequencies may be inaccurate due to receiver inaccuracies and drift.
panels.title: Receiver-Reported Payload Transmit Frequency

panels.description:
Shows the fairly common relationship between payload-reported voltages, and the payload temperature.
Note that not all voltage metrics may be available on all payloads.
panels.title: Voltages vs Temperature

options.content:
- [**Download KML**](https://api.v2.sondehub.org/amateur/telemetry/{{variable "Payload"}}?format=kml&datetime={{data.0.datetime }}&last={{toFixed data.0.durationS 0}})
- [**Download CSV**](https://api.v2.sondehub.org/amateur/telemetry/{{variable "Payload"}}?format=csv&datetime={{data.0.datetime }}&last={{toFixed data.0.durationS 0}})
- [**Download JSON**](https://api.v2.sondehub.org/amateur/telemetry/{{variable "Payload"}}?datetime={{data.0.datetime }}&last={{toFixed data.0.durationS 0}})

**Note:** The CSV and JSON outputs include __all__ packets received by __all__ receivers, so are likely to contain duplicate entries and may also be out-of-order.
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

panels.title: Export Data for current Time Range

panels.description: Payload speed, as reported within payload telemetry. Only available on some payload types (Horus Binary v2)
panels.title: Payload Speed (Reported)

panels.description: Payload speed, calculated from position/time deltas. Note that the Time will be in local time, due to known issues with Apache eCharts.
panels.title: Payload Speed (calculated)
